p: To construct the full cells, the pre‐sodiated hard carbon was adopted as the anode and well matched with the P2‐Na 0.76Cu 0.22Fe 0.30Mn 0.48O 2 cathode. The active mass loading ratio of cathode to anode was set at 1.7:1 to balance the capacity. Finally, the full cell was measured within a voltage window of 1.6–3.8 V.
